Note: 3) use whitespace to build that flow.

hierarchy gives your site order: 
1) define where you want your audience to look first.
2)establish a flow that corresponds to your content's message.
whitespace is related to visual hierarchy
but, do not exaggerate. they can lose their relationship.
put whitespace between your elements! between your groups of elements! and between sections!!
space between sections, icons/text, headings and content, and between paragraphs.
white space is key to clean look/feel
